titulo.descripcion: I am a web and mobile developer, quality control analyst. Responsible, communicative, and honest. I work well in teams and also independently.

servicios.movil-desc: I develop your mobile app tailored to your needs
servicios.testing-desc: I perform testing of your systems and applications through functional, non-functional, unit, and stress tests
servicios.requerimientos-desc: I analyze and gather requirements for your system or applications to make it as complete as possible
servicios.sociales-desc: I handle your social media in a way that increases engagement
servicios.soporte-desc: I provide support for the applications or systems I have developed for you in case you need assistance
servicios.venta-desc: I also have a grocery sales business, in case you are interested in buying, we are located in Cali, Granada neighborhood
